prompt: Bailley ji ụfọdụ ego were malite. Mgbe ahụ ọ na-anata ụgwọ $5 n'izu maka izu ụka asatọ. Na ngwụcha izu ụka asatọ, ọ bụrụ na o nwere ngụkọta $100, ego ole ka Bailey jiri malite?

Otu klasị nwere bọọdụ ọcha nke a na-ekere ndị nkụzi anọ ndị nke na-ewe oge n'ahiri eji klasị ahụ eme ịhe. Onye nkụzi ọbụla nwere ịhe nkụzi abụọ kwa ụbọchị ma na-eji bọọdụ ọcha na nkụzi ọbụla. Ọ bụrụ na a ná-ehicha bọọdụ ọcha ugboro atọ n'oge nkụzi ọbụla, kedụ ugboro ole a ná-ehicha bọọdụ ọcha ahụ kwa ụbọchị?

Kylar gaara n'ọnụ ụlọahia ịzụta ugegbe maka ụlọ ọhụrụ ya. Otu ugegbe dara ọnụ ego $5, mana nke abụọ ọbụla dara ọnụ ego bụ naanị 60% ego nke mbụ. Kylar na-achọ ịzụ ugegbe iri na isii. Ego ole ka o kwesịrị ịkwụ maka ha?

Isakoshi yibitabo bya  Uriah iramuremereye cyane. Ashaka gukuramo ibiro 15. Ibitabo bye byishekesha bipima ibiro 1/4 buri gitabo kandi ibikinisho bye bipima ibiro 1/2 buri gikinisho. Niba akuyemo ibitabo bishekesha 30, nibikinisho bingahe akeneye gukuramo ?
